page.title: 20TOURISM
page.content:
The {countryside}around Denton attracts many visitors during the summer. Many pass through on their way to the broads or the coast,but some stay to savour the rural atmosphere. 3 farms offer{bed & breakfast}facilities featuring "farmhouse cooking" as a major attraction.There is 1 permanent {camp site}used mainly for caravans. Sycamore Farm{Potteries}offer special holidays where the skill of pottery is taught.Visitors to the workshop can look & buy all year round.They also offer adult education courses through the Local Authority.
This survey of Denton was undertaken by members of Denton Womens Institute who also took the photographs.
